name: cloudsql-mysql
description: Node.js MySQL sample for Cloud SQL
author: Google Inc.

scripts.test: npm run system-test && npm run system-test-unix
scripts.gcloud:run: gcloud run deploy cloud-api --image gcr.io/vbreddyblog/run-sql --add-cloudsql-instances vbreddyblog:us-central1:vbreddy-sql-inc --set-env-vars INSTANCE_UNIX_SOCKET='/cloudsql/vbreddyblog:us-central1:vbreddy-sql-inc' --set-env-vars INSTANCE_CONNECTION_NAME='vbreddyblog:us-central1:vbreddy-sql-inc' --set-env-vars DB_NAME='vbreddy-api-db' --set-env-vars DB_USER='vbreddy-api-user' --set-env-vars DB_PASS='vbreddy-api-pwd'
scripts.docker:run: gcloud run deploy vbreddy-cloud-api --project=vbreddyblog --platform=managed --region=us-central1 --image=gcr.io/vbreddyblog/vbreddy-cloud-api --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars INSTANCE_UNIX_SOCKET='/cloudsql/vbreddyblog:us-central1:vbreddy-sql-inc' --set-env-vars INSTANCE_CONNECTION_NAME='vbreddyblog:us-central1:vbreddy-sql-inc' --set-env-vars DB_NAME='vbreddy-api-db' --set-env-vars DB_USER='vbreddy-api-user' --set-env-vars DB_PASS='vbreddy-api-pwd'
